title: crash after new windows 10 anniversary update
body:
i installed the new windows 10 update a few days ago and noticed everything was wonky, after relocating the displaced file for the game and launching it, i tried to play a game only to have it crash on me after champ select. ive sent in the error and tried updating all my drivers. nvidia gave me a hard time but i was able to update my graphics card after a while. 
i thought that would work, nope
tried repairing the game, nope
went through the support and did everything on there, still nope
uninstalled and reinstalled the game, nope
i sent in a ticket with the hextec log files, still no answer...
 im out of ideas and wind, is there anyone out there that can help ?

replies.body:
Different crashes can be caused by different things. In your case, since you specifically mention this happening after the recent Windows 10 Anniversary update, it's likely caused by that update. In this anniversary package, some changes were made to Xbox game bar and the DVR feature was enabled by default. I recommend disabling that feature entirely using [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), as it has been able to resolve this issue for a decent amount of players.

Let me know the results of those steps.
i have exactly the same problem and it works!!!!!! thank you very much!!!
